name: MOUZETRAP
description:
Welcome to MOUZETRAP Program! An educational software for learning typing! Kids will learn how to use keyboard, concept of endless suffering and a lot of curse words! There is no punishment for mistakes, you only get thrown back in time so you can try again :)

CHARARACTER CAST

MOUZE - a mouse.

CAT - blue cat.

PLAYER - one that helps the story move forward
